Nothing spectacular. Still me though

Hi, my name is flo. I am a front-end dev based in France. I work as UI Designer & Support Engineer at odaseva.com, a young and dynamic startup.

odaseva.com

odaseva.com is the team of Salesforce specialists behind Odaseva for Salesforce, a platform offering Backup & Recovery capabilities, as well as Release Management Tools to Salesforce customers. The company has a wide range of enterprise customers, including Fortune 500 companies, and operates from both beautiful France & sunny San Francisco.
If you're into Salesforce, chek out odaseva.com

Development addict

Developer by day,... developer by night. The design and development experience I have gathered during 15+ years spent within various firms has made me an addict to the Front-end subject. I quickly specialized in responsive web design (like everybody else) when the trend emerged, often use Wordpress, Perch and Jekyll as prefered CMS solutions, and like to get involved in mentorship.

Wanna discuss mentorship / Say Hi ?
